skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of decreasing the duration of 2 random buffs on the target by 1 turn. If the target is under a [Fear] or [True Fear] debuff, has a 65% chance of decreasing the duration of all of the target's buffs by 1 turn instead.
skills.name: Smell Fear
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 30% of the target’s DEF. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 25% after the attack. 

If the target is under a [Fear] or [True Fear] debuff, decreases the cooldown of the Dismay skill by 1 turn.
skills.name: Harbinger

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of decreasing each enemy's Turn Meter by 20%. If there are any enemies under [Fear] or [True Fear] debuffs, will also fill this Champion’s Turn Meter by the amount those enemies lose.
skills.name: Dismay
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Whenever an enemy’s Turn Meter is fully depleted by any Champion, has a 50% chance of placing a [True Fear] debuff on that enemy for 1 turn.
skills.name: Desolation [P]
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
